metadata.Title: CVE-2011-0047 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in MediaWiki before 1.16.2 allowsremote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via craftedCascading Style Sheets (CSS) comments, aka "CSS injection vulnerability."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2011-0047` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.19.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.19.2-1').
